column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The ramen here is too salty
column3: and overpriced. I got the cha cha cha
column4: which is apparently for garlic lovers
column5: but the broth did not tastes anything like garlic. Instead it was salty and bitter from the ginger flavor. Also
column6: I had to pay extra 50 cents to make it spicy. What the heck??
